multitext.text: To play this game you require the latest version Flash Player. Please click the link below and follow the quick and simple installation instructions.
Note that any Jackpots are shown and paid in your account currency.

Rapunzel's Tower
About the game Rapunzelâ€™s Tower is a 5 reel, 20 bet line video slot. The game features Free Spins, Bonus Wilds stick until you win, Stacked Wilds, and the Free Spins Tower Feature. Theoretical payout is: 97.05% with Feature Bet enabled 92.72% with Feature Bet disabled
How to play Video slots are very easy to play. Just follow the 3 steps:
1. Choose your total bet 2. Press the SPIN button 3. Check for any win in the WIN field
For more understanding of Settings, Game Rules, and Game Features read the text below.
Description of game functionality
Bet The Total bet is shown in the TOTAL BET display. Change the bet by clicking on the display and decide on the total bet of your choice. The Total Bet is based on the bet per line multiplied with the number of bet lines active. The number of bet lines used in the game can be changed by clicking on the BET LINES display. FEATURE BET enables the 'Bonus Wilds stick until you win' feature. The cost of feature bet is the basic bet (number of bet lines multiplied with bet per line) multiplied with 1,5.
Spin The game is started by pressing the SPIN button. You can Quick stop the game by pressing the SPIN button again.
Win Any total win in a game round will be displayed in the WIN field. All wins are multiplied with the bet per bet line. Bet line wins pay in succession from leftmost to right. Only the highest win per active bet line is paid. The separate bet line wins will be displayed on the bet lines during win presentation. In Free Spins only the total win is displayed for each spin.
Paytable All winning combinations in the game can be viewed in the PAYTABLE.
Fast Play The FAST PLAY functionality can is used to get the shortest game round possible. The duration of game rounds may vary depending on bandwidth and server response time.
Autoplay Autoplay allow you to have the game play a number of game rounds automatically. Press AUTOPLAY and choose a number of game rounds to initiate Autoplay. The remaining number of spins is displayed to the right of the STOP button. Autoplay is stopped by pressing the STOP button.
Settings In the settings panel at the low left of the game you can choose: - Use SPACE for spin Use SPACE for spin allows you to use your Space Bar on your keyboard to initiate game rounds.
- Show Splash Screen on startup This setting allows you to switch the games Splash Screen on and off.

BONUS WILDS STICK UNTIL YOU WIN

3+ Bonus Wild symbols initiate feature. Bonus Wild symbols stick to their position and initiate respin. The game will respin until a win is rewarded.
Feature is only active if FEATURE BET is enabled.
Bonus Wilds act as regular wild symbols if feature is disabled.
Bonus Wilds appear on reels 2, 3 and 4.
Wild symbol substitutes for all symbols except the Free Spin scatter symbol.

3 Scatter symbols initiate 10 free spins.
Additional Free Spins can be rewarded both in the Tower feature and by getting 3 Scatter symbols.
Free Spin Scatters appear on reels 2, 3 and 4.

Climb the tower to save Rapunzel!
Each Bonus Wild symbol appearing on the reels in Free Spins awards one step on the tower.
Step 10 rewards 2 additional spins Step 15 rewards 1 additional spin Step 20 rewards 2 additional spins Step 25 rewards 2 additional spins and an X2 multiplier on wins in remaining spins.
Scatter wins are added to payline wins
WINS MULTIPLIED BY BET PER LINE. Only the highest win per active bet line is paid. Bet line wins pay if in succession from leftmost to right. Malfunction voids all pays.
WILDS STICK UNTIL YOU WIN feature is now active.
WILDS STICK UNTIL YOU WIN feature is no longer active.
BONUS WILDS STICK UNTIL YOU WIN
